text: Nirdistakalera jan'ya [1] amara yadi tadera theke sasti sthagita rakhi tabe tara abasya'i balabe, â€˜kise seta nibarana karecha?â€™ Sabadhana! Yedina tadera kache eta asabe sedina tadera kache theke setake nibrtta kara habe na ebam ya niye tara thatta- bidrupa kare ta taderake paribestana karabe
